attributes.action: increase the taxes on second cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the world is getting polluted and it is getting worse everyday so therefore, I prepose that the taxes on people owning a more than one car should be increased.  I think this because people don't need more than one car, it will cut down on the air pollution and encourage people to use the public transport more often.
